channel.title: locale on Machine Learning
channel.description: Recent content in locale on Machine Learning

item.title: Locale In Case Of
item.description: Reconfig Locale # Option 1: mkdir -p /var/lib/locales/supported.d/ && \ echo "en_GB.UTF-8 UTF-8" > /var/lib/locales/supported.d/gb && \ echo "zh_CN.UTF-8 UTF-8" > /var/lib/locales/supported.d/zh && \ echo "sv_SE.UTF-8 UTF-8" > /var/lib/locales/supported.d/se && \ locale-gen Option 2: dpkg-reconfigure locales can use first character of locale-name to nevigate. ref
